reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the characters! The mystery of who was behind it. I can't wait to read the rest of the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This was packed with action and steamy romance!!The story was a complicated mix of corruption and trafficking. Since Samantha had only recently returned to her home town, after taking time off from the Detroit police department, it was unexpected when she and Sheriff Hunter were forced to team up and try to get answers to the strange activities in the county. Samantha’s childhood crush on the older Hunter made their reunion so many years later all the sweeter.I look forward to finding out more about Hunter’s sexy friends in the next books in the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This definitely isn’t for anyone who can’t handle sexy talk. It definitely was a great read. I’ve ordered all 3 of them! I haven’t been disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot, steamy with a great story line.
reviews.reviewText: This was a great read. Story kept you intrigued to find out who done it. I highly recommend this excellent book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great debut to Moving Violations series
reviews.reviewText: All I can say is wow! What a great debut to the Moving Violations series with captivating characters you want to root for and a fast-paced story that kept me entertained and intrigued from beginning to end and turning the pages as fast as I could to see what would happen. I was totally mesmerized by the nail-biting, heart-pounding suspense and skin-scorching intimacy. I loved the undeniable chemistry between Sheriff Hunter Steele and Samantha Ryder, a Detroit cop who returns to her hometown of Deerhaven, California after her aunt dies unexpectedly.This book is a must-read for anyone who enjoys a well-crafted, suspenseful romance. I received an advance reader copy from the publisher via NetGalley and this is my voluntary review. I liked the book so much, I purchased a copy for my keeper library.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This is my first book by both of these authors so I am not familiar with either of their writing styles so I was not sure what to expect.I think the overall storyline was well developed and plotted out well. As for the main characters I think that there could have been a little more of their past history given since childhood. It was very brief. In addition, it seemed to me that the two characters rushed into a romantic relationship a little two fast even though there was connection between them. That might have been what the authors wanted but seemed awkward to me at times.I really did enjoy the murder mystery crime aspect of the book that they added to this romance book from start to finish of the book that the reader gets to experience. I think that is something unique to this book that not alot of authors have in addition to the normal romance.I am definitely interested to see what the next book in this series has in store because there was alot that they had in this story it will be interesting to see what they will do to top it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: One Tough Cowboy is an amazing read. I love the hot cowboy sheriff and the suspense that follows through out this read. You are in for a treat with this one. Hunter and Samantha couldn't be more perfect for each other. They will burn your pages as they work together to solve what is going down in their town. Samantha is one little firecracker. Not only is she a cop but she doesn't take crap from the other men. Hunter what can I say I love his alpha side. I love how just does everything he can to make Samantha his. I for one can't wait for more to come in this series. This is an amazing read that I couldn't put down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great, exciting story!
reviews.reviewText: Lora Leigh is always one of my favorite authors and this story doesn’t disappoint. The excitement of the story pulls you in and never lets you go. It does have some grammatical errors but they didn’t throw me off too much. Overall it’s a great story and I can’t wait to read the next in the series.
Maravilhoso. Fico esperando a continuação da série.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoyed this book. Great characters and what appears to be a good start to an interesting series. Some intriguing characters that you just want to know more about. Looking forward to the next one.
Love Lora Leigh's novels. This was great story that kept you interested right from the start. The love between the Hunter and Sam is sweet and fiery hot.
Fantastic read, characters engaged you at all times. Sam and Hunter drag you into their lives. Once again, a brilliant story.
